Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m_central_apx10_JM2017
Configuration.SetupScript:
# config.wavelength = 5 # config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 # config.det = 19250 # config.det_offset = 0 # config.srce = 150 # config.guide = 'ga' # config.apx = -72 # config.bs = 2 # config.beamcenterx = 91.73 # config.beamcenterz = 94.32

Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator # sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.drive('nvs_speed', 25476) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) driveDet(19250, 0) driveEntRotAp(150) driveGuide('ga') sics.drive('apx', -72) selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 92.10) sics.set('beamcenterz', 94.52)
